info.description: The `helm-api` API. This API is used by the Catalog UI to interact with Tiller and Kubernetes.
info.title: Helm API

get.description: Returns `204` if version supported. DO NOT ADD A TRAILING `/`.

get.summary: Is API running and ready to receive traffic?
get.description: Returns 200 if API is running and ready to receive traffic.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

get.description: Returns a list of synched assets unpacked from the specific chart version.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm repo.

parameters.name: chart_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm chart.

parameters.name: chart_version
parameters.description: Version of Helm chart.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

parameters.name: chart_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm chart.

get.summary: List all versions of a chart.
get.description: List all versions of a specific chart from a specific synched repo.

parameters.description: Name of Helm repo.

parameters.name: chart_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm chart.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

get.description: List specific version of a specific chart from a specific synched repo.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm repo.

parameters.name: chart_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm chart.

parameters.name: chart_version
parameters.description: Version of Helm chart.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

get.description: List release history for specific release.

parameters.name: release_name
parameters.description: Name of release.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Max number of history items.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit of release items returned.

parameters.name: sort-by
parameters.description: The string options for sorting releases. Options include name and last-released.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The basic regex used for filtering releases based on release name.

parameters.name: sort-order
parameters.description: The string options for ordering releases. Options include asc or desc.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The string release name used as the first returned release in sorted order.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Parameters for installing a Release.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

parameters.name: release_name
parameters.description: Name of release.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

parameters.name: release_name
parameters.description: Name of release.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

parameters.name: release_name
parameters.description: Name of release.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Parameters for updating a Release.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

post.description: Roll back release to specific history revision.

parameters.description: Name of release.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Parameters for rolling back a Release.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

get.description: Lists release CRNs for releases installed from specific chart.

parameters.name: chart_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm chart.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

get.description: Lists all helm chart repositories available for synching.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

post.description: Adds helm chart repository for synching.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Parameters for adding Helm chart repo.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

delete.description: Removes helm chart repository from list of synchable repositories.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm repo.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

put.description: Updates helm chart repository for synching.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm repo.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Parameters for updating Helm chart repo.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

put.description: Restores default helm chart repositories, even if they were updated or deleted.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

get.description: Downloads and unpacks all helm charts from all listed helm chart repositories.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

get.description: List values for specific chart version of specific chart from specific synched repository.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm repo.

parameters.name: chart_name
parameters.description: Name of Helm chart.

parameters.name: chart_version
parameters.description: Version of Helm chart.

parameters.name: COOKIE
parameters.description: Set to `cfc-access-token-cookie={ACCESS_TOKEN}; postspace`, where `ACCESS_TOKEN` is the user's access token.

{chart_name}.description: Key is name of Helm chart. Value is either 'Success', 'Failed:{status_code}', or 'Up-to-Date'.
